results.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Light (Kids)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Kids ‘Light’ introduces UV-sensitive technology to the Yeezy franchise. When exposed to direct sunlight, the flexible Primeknit upper transitions from off-white to a subtle pink hue, while the post-dyed monofilament side stripe takes on a darker shade of amber. The sock-like build is secured with traditional lace closure and equipped with a webbing pull tab at the heel for easy on and off. Lightweight cushioning is provided by a wrapped Boost midsole, fully visible through cut-outs in the rubber outsole.

results.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 700 MNVN Bright Cyan (Kids)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 700 MNVN Kids ‘Bright Cyan’ pairs a minimalist build with ultra-responsive cushioning. No-tie bungee laces secure a seamless upper crafted from a single piece of lightweight polyester in a vibrant blue finish. Emblazoned across the lateral side panel is silver reflective ‘700’ branding in a reverse mirror print. The sneaker is mounted on a sculpted black polyurethane midsole, enhanced with full-length drop-in Boost cushioning within and a herringbone-tread rubber outsole underfoot.

results.name: adidas Stan Smith Marvel Hulk Smash (PS)
adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Ash Pearl (Kids)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Kids ‘Ash Pearl’ shows off split color blocking on a sock-like upper constructed from breathable Primeknit. The top-down view reveals a visible seam that runs down the vamp, separating varying tan and grey shades on the lateral and medial sides. The former is accented with a monofilament side stripe, which gives way to more grey tones on the lower portion of the shoe. Decorated with no-tie elastic laces, the upper is mounted atop full-length Boost midsole.

results.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Black Red (Kids)
results.story: Launching in December 2020, the adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Kids ‘Bred’ brings back a simplistic two-tone colorway of the lifestyle silhouette first released in 2017. The reissue is unchanged from the original, featuring a black Primeknit upper with ‘SPLY-350’ inscribed in reverse-print red lettering on the lateral side panel. An additional pop of red appears via embroidered detailing on a pull tab at the heel. The sneaker rides on a full-length Boost midsole, entirely wrapped in a semi-translucent rubber cage.

results.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 380 Onyx (Kids)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 380 Kids ‘Onyx Non-Reflective’ offers a subdued colorway of the minimalist silhouette, featuring a composition of black and dark brown fibers that make up the re-engineered Primeknit upper. The resulting camo-like design is interrupted on the sneaker’s lateral side, where a post dyed monofilament side stripe sweeps through the midfoot. A smokey rubber cage envelops the Boost midsole, visible through cut-outs in the gum rubber outsole.

results.name: adidas Yeezy 700 V3 Safflower (Kids)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy 700 V3 Kids ‘Safflower’ presents a subtle colorway of the sleek silhouette, highlighted by flowing yellow lines throughout the monofilament engineered mesh upper. The lightweight build is reinforced with a glow-in-the-dark RPU cage for added support and durability, while a contrasting black interior bootie provides a snug, one-to-one fit. An ivory hue coats the PU encapsulated EVA midsole, supported underfoot by a herringbone rubber outsole.

results.name: adidas Yeezy QNTM Teal Blue (Kids)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Quantum Kids ‘Teal Blue’ makes use of a Primeknit upper in a subtle palette of grey, black and teal. Silver reflective thread is woven into the side panels, forming wavy lines that provide added visibility in low-light conditions. A two-tone heel cap is similarly rendered in reflective finish, while matte black neoprene is utilized on the collar and tongue. The minimalist build rides on a full-length Boost midsole, encased in semi-translucent rubber for improved stability.

results.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Carbon (Kids)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Kids ‘Carbon’ delivers a neutral colorway of the slip-on sneaker, secured with no-tie bungee laces for a snug fit. The upper makes use of breathable Primeknit in a mostly black finish with varying shades of grey throughout. On the lateral side, a black monofilament side stripe cuts through the two-tone woven paneling. Responsive cushioning arrives via a full-length Boost midsole, encased entirely in semi-translucent rubber.

results.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 380 Pepper (Kids)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 380 Kids ‘Pepper Non-Reflective’ features subtle hues on a minimalist silhouette that does away with rigid structure and clearly defined lines. Instead, the sock-like Primeknit build highlights an amorphous, camo-like pattern, made up of beige and light grey hues that are contrasted by a splash of orange on the post-dyed monofilament side stripe. A full-length Boost midsole, confined within a greyish blue rubber cage, delivers a cushioned ride.

results.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Israfil (Kids)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Kids ‘Israfil’ features a breathable Primeknit upper that combines a blend of yarns in pale yellow and bluish-grey hues, rendered in different woven patterns for a patchwork-like effect. A post-dyed monofilament side stripe in orange delivers a pop of color on the sneaker’s lateral side. Secured with elastic no-tie laces, the minimalist silhouette rides on a full-length Boost midsole, reinforced with a semi-translucent rubber outsole.

results.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 380 Blue Oat (Kids)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 380 Kids ‘Blue Oat Non-Reflective’ showcases clashing hues throughout the breathable Primeknit upper. A streak of royal blue stands out on the translucent monofilament window woven into the side panel, contrasted by a blend of orange and brown hues arranged in a camo-like pattern. The lightweight build is supported by a Boost midsole, encased in semi-translucent rubber and supported by a herringbone rubber outsole.

results.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Zyon (Kids)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Kids ‘Zyon’ delivers a neutral colorway of Kanye West’s lifestyle sneaker, highlighted by complementary grey and brown tones on a stretchy Primeknit upper. Traditional lace closure enhances the fit of the slip-on silhouette, while a black monofilament side stripe provides added breathability. The lightweight build rests on a full-length Boost midsole, visible through cut-out detailing on the rubber midsole.

results.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 700 MNVN Bone (Kids)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 700 MNVN Kids ‘Bone’ features a tan polyester upper, accented on the lateral side panel with oversized 700 branding in a reflective silver finish. The lightweight build is secured with no-tie bungee laces, while contrasting black overlays provide added durability. A matching black PU midsole houses full-length drop-in Boost cushioning, visible underfoot through cut-out detailing on the herringbone rubber outsole.
